#define PARSE_SCALAR_PARAM2 ( SHORT,
LONG,
VALUE1,
VALUE2   ) 

Value:

else if(str == SHORT || str == LONG)                 \
    {                                                    \
      if(argc < 2 ||                                     \
         argv[i+1][0] == '-' || argv[i+2][0] == '-')     \
        return false;                                    \
      std::stringstream tmp;                             \
      tmp << argv[i+1] << " " << argv[i+2];              \
      tmp >> VALUE1;                                     \
      tmp >> VALUE2;                                     \
      argc-=2;                                           \
      i+=2;                                              \
    }
